name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells dispatch a spider to spy on your foes, increasing your Intellect by 70 per report received. Stacks up to 40 times. This effect may only occur every 6 sec.
Use: Use your accumulated knowledge to strike when the time is right, granting 651 Intellect per report for 20 sec and consuming their passive effect. (20 Sec Cooldown)

name: Unbound Changeling

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to grant you 4,646 Haste for 12 sec.

description: This strange critter has a rather unsettling habit of staring at you while you eat.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain scendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

scendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
